Package control

Class AdmCliente

java.lang.Object
control.AdmCliente
public final class AdmCliente extends Object
Client Management Class, hosts tasks and important things related to it.
Since:
1.0

    • getTempClient

      Gets the temporary client helper object
      Returns:
      A Cliente helper object that contain a manually registered client
      Since:
      1.6

    • fillGenders

      public void fillGenders(JComboBox cmbGender, Commons.WindowMode mode)
      Fills a given JComboBox object with the sorted predefined client genders
      Parameters:
      cmbGender - The given JComboBox object to be filled
      mode - The specified window mode to work, given this method is used to fill the client gender JComboBox in both Search and Register Client windows, with the diference that in the first one it has to add the All word at the beginning, so this parameter is used to determine that difference and do what corresponds adding that word when needed
      Since:
      1.6

    • fillClientAgeCriterias

      public void fillClientAgeCriterias(JComboBox cmbClientAgeCriterias)
      Fills a JComboBox object with the client age searching criterias
      Parameters:
      cmbClientAgeCriterias - The JComboBox object to be filled
      Since:
      1.6

    • registerClient

      public void registerClient(String id, String name, int age, char gender)
      Registers a new client using the Cliente helper object, setting its attributes with the received ones
      Parameters:
      id - Client/Person ID (Numero de Cedula)
      name - Client name
      age - Client Age
      gender - Client gender as a char: Male -> 'M' or Female -> 'F'
      Since:
      1.6
      See Also:
      • Cliente

    • generarCliente

      public Cliente generarCliente()
      Gets in a pseudo-randomly way a new Cliente object from a list of 10 predefined stored clients using the Random class
      Returns:
      An existing Cliente object pseudo-randomly choosed
      See Also:
      • Cliente
